page.title: 09My House near New Deer
page.content: My house is a big old farmhouse called{South Mains of Auchmaliddie. Parts of the house are over{200 years {old}and some parts, like the back porch, are new. My mum and dad moved into the house before I was born and they{modernised the house. They did a lot of the work themselves helped by our neighbour, who they bought the house from. They also had some of the work done by masons, electricians and plumbers. We now have{oil-fired central {heating and double glazing}which my dad put in and the house is much more cosy. {Lots of the houses round about have {been renovated}in recent years so the people who live in them are not so cold in the winter. Jane H. Smith, South Mains of Auchmaliddie.
